duration_in_months: People work on this project for 31 months
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: EP916-240291 Corporate Collab Area
#### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to respond to a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the construction services required for the Corporate Collab Area fit-up project.

#### Project Identification and Description
*   **Project Number:** R.119096.001
*   **Project Location:** 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario
*   **Project Description:** The project involves the interior fit-up of the Corporate Collab Area, with a project duration of 31 weeks after contract award.

#### Mandatory Security Requirement
Prior to contract award, bidders must hold a valid security clearance as indicated in section SC01 of the Supplementary Conditions.

#### Tender Details
*   **Procurement Category:** Construction and Maintenance Services
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information
*   **Contact Name:** Dale Rudderham (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** dale.rudderham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18452837?extsite=MTg0NTI4MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that the following information has been removed/omitted in the original submission:
	*   Regions of Opportunity
	*   Regions of Delivery (excluding NCR)
	*   Contact Phone Number
	*   Contact Fax
	*   Contact Address Lines
	*   Contact City
	*   Contact Province
	*   Contact Postal Code
	*   Contact Country
	*   Attachment/Pieces Jointes

Please let me know if you need further assistance with this piece. 

#### Project Timeline
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 20, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** September 24, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 25, 2024
